Felix is 33 years old and is in a free union [a type of common law marriage in Ecuador]. He has one son and lives with his mother in San Francisco district which is part of Ventanas canton in Provincia de Los Rios.

He belongs to the communal bank Cevallos, located in San Francisco district and part of Ventanas canton which is dedicated to agricultural and livestock activities. He is a new member of the communal bank.

Felix makes a living in agriculture sowing rice and raising barnyard animals such as chickens and pigs. With the loan he will be able to buy supplies such as: fertilizers, manure, insecticides to prevent pests and diseases, as well as livestock feed. He makes his purchases in the city of Ventanas.

The loan will help him to grow his income and his crops. His dream is to buy a house where he can live with his mom. In his free time, he enjoys sports.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, insecticides to prevent pests and diseases, in addition to livestock feed

loans.name: Edgar Patricio

texts.es:
Edgar tiene 27 años de edad es  casado tiene un hijo vive la esposa y con el hijo en el Recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos. 

Pertenece a la Ventanilla LOS AMIGOS se encuentra ubicada el  recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO  , perteneciente al cantón Ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias. 

Edgar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz y la crianza de animales de corral como pollos y patos. Con el crédito podrá comprar insumos como: fertilizantes, abonos, insecticidas para evitar las plagas y enfermedades, ademas alieto para los animales balanceado. Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de Ventanas. 

El sueño es comprar un terreno para construir la casa, en los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte
texts.en:
Edgar is 27 years old, married and has one child. He lives with his wife and his son in the ZAPOTAL NUEVO area, belonging to the canton of Ventanas, in the province of Los Ríos. 

He belongs to the group LOS AMIGOS (The friends) which is located in the ZAPOTAL NUEVO area, belonging to the canton Ventanas, which is dedicated to agricultural and livestock work. 

Edgar is dedicated to agriculture through the sowing of corn and the raising of animals, like chickens and ducks. With the loan, he will be able to buy items like fertilizers and insecticides to prevent pests and diseases, in addition to supplements for his animals. He does his shopping in the city of Ventanas. 

His dream is to buy land to build a house. In his free time he likes to do sports.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides to avoid pests and diseases, and also supplements for the animals.

loans.name: Mirtha

texts.es:
Mirtha, de 45 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además tiene muchas  ideas de negocios e ilusiones de salir adelante. Esta  con Julio quien se dedica al transporte.  Juntos habitan cómodamente su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Mirtha es la venta de mercadería variada como ropas, carteras, peluches, adornos y otros,  además de productos de belleza como esmaltes, cremas faciales, perfumes y otros. Todos estos productos son comprados por catálogos para ser vendidos desde su casa entes sus vecinas y amistades siendo sus clientes habituales, además de los recomendados. 
Se inició hace más de 10 años contando con un capital propio fruto de sus ahorros y hasta el momento lo viene realizando sola.
Considera  a su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias que le deja al acabar todos los productos que tiene en stock. 
Comenta que decidió empezar con este negocio propio para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y contar con ingresos económicos, además de contar con un oficio y sentirse una persona productiva.
En el futuro espera poder aumentar el stock de su mercadería y ver crecer su negocio. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 05 con la institución MFP. Espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por eso tiene el compromiso de cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas  para tener un buen record crediticio.
Con el monto solicitado de 3500 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería como productos de belleza, y regalos por fiestas navideñas y año nuevo  y   aumentar su stock, buscando precios cómodos por sus compras, de esa manera obtendrá mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Mirtha, 45 years old, is a diligent, hardworking woman with many business ideas and dreams of success. She is with Julio, who is in transportation. They live comfortably together in their own house.

Mirtha has a business selling a variety of merchandise, such as clothing, purses, stuffed toys, ornaments and other items, as well as beauty products such as nail polish, face creams, perfumes and so forth. She buys all these products by catalog and then sells them from her home to her neighbors and friends, all of whom are regular customers. She also gets referrals.

She started her business more than ten years ago with her own capital, drawn from her savings. She has run the business alone until now. She feels it has been quite profitable based on the income she earns when she sells all the merchandise she has in stock. She says she decided to start her own business to help her husband with household expenses and to have a source of income. She also wanted to have a job and to feel productive.

In the future she hopes to able to expand her inventory and see her business grow. This will be her fifth loan from MFP. She hopes to obtain a small loan so that she can meet her objectives. She is committed to making all of her payments on time so that she will have a good credit history.

With the sum requested, S/.3,500, she will purchase merchandise such as beauty products and gifts for Christmas and the New Year and expand her inventory. She seeks reasonable prices for her purchases so that she will have higher earnings.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products and gift items for the Christmas holidays.

loans.name: Abdou Karim

texts.fr: Abdou Karim est un homme marié.Il est père de trois enfants. Il exerce dans le commerce de friperie depuis trois ans.Il s'approvisionne auprès des grands commerçants de Dakar et revend au détail sa marchandise.Son activité arrive à générer des revenus consistants qui lui permettent de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille ainsi qu'à ses propres besoins.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 300 000f pour acheter des balles de friperie. Son ambition est de faire des voyages de commerce dans les pays environnants.
texts.en: Abdou Karim is a married man, who is father to three children. He has been selling second-hand clothing for the past three years and gets his supplies from large traders in Dakar, reselling his goods on a retail basis. His business is sufficient to generate a regular income which enables him to provide for his family's needs as well as his own. In order to build up his business he is requesting a loan of 300,000 francs to buy bales of second-hand clothing. His ambition is to travel for his business in surrounding countries.

loans.use: to buy bales of second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Claudia Elena

texts.es: Claudia Elena a sus 32 años de edad casada con un hijo de 6 añitos de edad actualmente está en primaria, ella es maestra en dos escuelas en el municipio de Villanueva, Chinandega, tiene 7 créditos con nosotros en los cuales poco a poco ha venido mejorando su vivienda en las condiciones que ella tiene aún no ha podido complementar su objetivo, y darle un mejor lugar donde vivir a su hijo, ella necesita financiamiento para comprar materiales de construcción para la mejora de un cuarto como: cerámica, cemento, arena y otros.-
texts.en: Claudia Elena is 32 years old and married with one 6-year-old child, who is currently in primary school. She is a teacher in two schools in the municipality of Villanueva, Chinandega. She has 7 loans with us, with which little by little, she has improved the living conditions that she has in her home. She has not yet been able to complete her goal and give her child a better place to live. She needs financing in order to purchase construction materials for improving a bedroom, such as: tiles, cement, sand, and others.

loans.use: to improve her home; for some years, she has been improving her house little by little, and now she needs to put tiles in a room.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha, de 48 años, es una mujer dulce. Vive junto a Silvestre, su esposo. Ambos tienen 5 hijos, pero solo viven con uno de ellos Edwin, al que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Pampa blanca. La actividad que más le agrada es la ganadería, cuenta con 6 vacas lecheras. En las mañanas su principal actividad es la venta de la misma a los pobladores de su localidad. Los que ya conocen del exquisito sabor que tiene, ahí ella obtiene ganancias diarias que le ayuda a sustentar su familia. De la misma manera, siembra papa, olluco, habas y demás alimentos que produce la tierra. Sus parcelas de sembrío se encuentran en la parte alta de la comunidad, por ello tiene que viajar muchas horas en burro para poder llegar, cuenta que le gusta trabajar, a pesar de ello. Por eso cuenta con excelentes cosechas de alimentos, pues como ella dice “lo que resulta de mucho esfuerzo, es mucho mejor”. Ahora se encuentra cosechando maíz, los que asegura ya tiene comprador, pues ella es una mujer con mucho empuje y coraje. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “pampa blanca” y este es el crédito número 9 con MFP, donde se siente feliz, ya que tiene muchos años trabajando con su asociación, donde los integrantes son personas, humanas y sobre todo con muchas ganas de ayudarse entre ellos. Martha, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de abono orgánico para esparcir entre sus sembríos de maíz, que dentro de unos días sembrará.
texts.en:
Martha, age 48, is a sweet-hearted woman. She lives with her husband Silvestre. They have five children, but they only care for one child named Edwin who lives with them in their own home located in the town of Pampa Blanca. The activity that gives her the most satisfaction is raising livestock. She has six dairy cows. In the mornings, her main activity is selling livestock to the residents of her town. Her customers know that her animals have good flavor, so Martha is able to generate a daily income to help sustain her family. In the same manner, she also grows potatoes, ulluco, beans, and other foodstuffs that are produced on her land. Her parcels of land are located in the high part of the community, so she must travel many hours by donkey to get to her farm. Despite this inconvenience, she enjoys the work. This explains the excellent quality of her crops. Martha says, “These results require much effort, but it is much better this way.” She is currently harvesting corn and already has a guaranteed buyer. Martha is a woman who has great drive and courage.

She is a member of the Communal Bank “Pampa Blanca” (White Plain) and this is her ninth loan with MFP. Martha is happy to have worked with her group for many years and all of the members are humane individuals who have the desire to help one another. She will invest the money she requested in the purchase of organic compost to apply on her cornfields that will be planted within a few days.

loans.use: to buy organic compost.

loans.name: Bolivar Vicente

texts.es:
Bolivar tiene 37 años de edad de estado civil Union Libre  tiene un hijo vive solo en el Recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos. 

Pertenece a la Ventanilla LOS AMIGOS se encuentra ubicada el  recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO  , perteneciente al cantón Ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias. 

Bolivar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz y la crianza de animales de corral como pollos y patos. Con el crédito podrá comprar insumos como: fertilizantes, abonos, insecticidas para evitar las plagas y enfermedades, ademas alieto para los animales balanceado. Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de Ventanas. 

El sueño es comprar un terreno, en los tiempos libres le gusta salir a jugar con el hijo.
texts.en:
Bolivar is 37 years old and in a common-law marriage. He has one child and lives alone in the precinct of Zapotal Nuevo, belonging to the Canton of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

He belongs to the communal bank Los Amigos, located in the precinct of Zapotal Nuevo, belonging to the canton of Ventanas. He works in agriculture and livestock. 

Bolivar works in agriculture sowing corn and raising farm animals like chickens and ducks. With the loan, he will be able to buy supplies such as: fertilizer, compost, and insecticides to avoid plagues and diseases, in addition to balanced feed for the animals. He will make his purchases in the city of Ventanas. 

His dream is to buy a plot of land; in his free time, he likes to go out and play with his son.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, compost, and insecticides to avoid plagues and diseases, in addition to balanced feed for his animals.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Lidia, de 47 años, es una mujer muy empeñosa, amable y muy trabajadora, no tiene ninguna relación sentimental pero tiene 03  hijos mayores de edad con quienes vive en su casa propia que pudo construir gracias al resultado de su trabajo,  continúa esforzándose por salir adelante.
El trabajo de Lidia consiste en la confección de prendas de vestir para damas caballeros y niños, ella se encarga con suma paciencia de elaborar las prendas que sus clientes le solicitan, se dedica principalmente a la lencería femenina. Pero también elabora con frecuencia algunas prendas que personalmente diseña de manera creatividad las cuales vende rápidamente. Se dedica a esta actividad más de 15 años, pero lamentablemente después de muchos años de trabajo tuvo que tomar un descanso de unos meses debido a un problema de salud, sin embargo, desde hace un año ha retomado su actividad laboral y ahora lo hace con muchas más ganas que antes porque es su pasión y se siente muy feliz cuando observa que su inspiración culmina en una hermosa prenda confeccionada por sus propias manos, siempre ha trabajado sola y afirma que nunca tuvo algún reclamo por parte de sus clientes. Está muy tranquila porque sabe que su trabajo le permite generar sus propios ingresos y no depender del dinero de sus hijos.
Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede plasmar en un prenda el diseño en que se inspira, la facilidad que tiene de crear algo nuevo la coloca como una de las mejores costureras de la ciudad, aunque asegura que no le agrada mucho elaborar pantalones de varón por el tiempo y la poca demanda; espera pronto construir un taller de costura y construir un espacio únicamente destinado a la venta de sus creaciones. Por tanto éste será su préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP, agradece la oportunidad y confianza que ponen en ella para recibir éste crédito, por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual, además le agrada ser parte del banco comunal al que pertenece ya que ha visto que sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado 800 nuevos soles comprará materiales de costura como telas, hilos, elásticos, encajes y licra. También en el arreglo de su local.
texts.en:
Lidia is forty-seven years old and is a very determined, kind, and hard-working woman.  She is not in any type of relationship but has three older children.  She lives with them in her own home that she was able to construct thanks to the results of her work.  She continues working in order to continue moving forward.  

Lidia's work consists in the manufacture of clothing for women, men, and children.  She is in charge and always has the utmost patience in creating the clothing that her customers request.  She mainly makes women's lingerie, but she also frequently makes some clothing that she personally designs in a creative way; these items always sell quickly.  

She has been working in this field for more than fifteen years.  Unfortunately, after many years of work, she had to take a few months off due to health problems.  However, a year ago she again began her physical tasks and now she works with more drive than before, since this is her passion and she feels very happy when she sees her inspiration become a beautiful piece of clothing made from her own hands.

She always has worked alone and says that she has never had a complaint from her customers.  She is very calm because she knows that her work allows her to generate her own income and she does not depend on the income of her children.

The thing she likes about her work is that she can give shape to an article of clothing with the design that inspires her.  The ease that she has in creating something new classifies her as one of the best seamstresses in the city.   She admits that she is not pleased when she she makes men's pants, since it takes a lot of time and there is little demand.  

She hopes to build a dressmaking workshop soon, and to build a space whose only use is for the sale of her creations.

This will be her second loan with the institution.  She is thankful for the opportunity and confidence that the institution puts in her in order to receive this loan.  She also promises to repay her installments on time.  It pleases her to be part of the communal bank; she has already seen that the members are responsible and caring people.

With the amount she is requesting (800 soles), she will buy sewing materials, like fabrics, threads, elastics, lace, and lycra.  She will also use some money to fix up her space.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, threads, elastics, lace, and lycra.

loans.name: Alex

texts.es:
Alex, tiene 30 años, es un joven alegre y muy trabajador, convive por mas de trece años con Sandra de 29 años, juntos tienen 4 pequeños hijos de 11, 6 y 3 años, mientras que su último bebé tiene recién 11 meses de nacido, vive junto a ellos en su casa que pudo construir en una parte del terreno de su suegro, todos los días se esfuerza por conseguir todo lo necesario para sus hijos a quienes ama con toda su alma. El trabajo de Alex consiste en la compra y venta de pescado al por mayor, todos los días se levanta muy temprano para comprar los pescados a los rematistas ambulantes que ofrecen sus productos frescos en el puerto pesquero de la ciudad.  Se encarga de seleccionar los mejores productos para luego llevarlos a su almacén en donde los congela, luego los coloca en sacos herméticos para finalmente enviarlos a otras ciudades. Realiza esta actividad todos los días del año desde las cuatro de la mañana y termina aproximadamente a las diez de la mañana. Se dedica a esta labor desde hace 14 años con la ayuda de dos miembros de su familia. Durante las tardes se dedica a conducir mototaxi. Realiza este oficio desde hace 02 años únicamente los días en los que no termina cansado en su trabajo de venta de pescados.
Le gusta mucho lo que hace porque siente que ayuda en la difusión de las especies pesqueras que existe en los ríos de su ciudad, además se alegra mucho porque promueve la conservación de los mismos rechazando y dando aviso a las autoridades cuando observa pescados cuyo venta no está apta para el consumo ya sea por el tamaño o por la temporada de veda. Espera más adelante poder exportar sus productos en mayor cantidad. Por tanto éste será su préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP, está muy contento de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá más seguro de avanzar con su trabajo. Además está muy contento de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos sus integrantes son muy responsables y solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado 700 nuevos soles  incrementará el capital económico que necesita para comprar mas pescados para vender a otra ciudad.
texts.en:
Alex is a 30-year old cheerful and hard-working man, who has lived with Sandra (29 years old) for more than 13 years. They have four children, aged 11, 6, 3 and 11 months old, and live together in a house that he could build in a piece of land of his father-in-law. He works hard everyday to provide his children, whom he loves with all his heart, with everything they need. 

Alex works buying and and selling fish in bulk. He wakes up very early every day to buy fish to the traveling auctioneers that offer their fresh products at the city's fishing harbor. He chooses the best products and takes them to his warehouse, where he freezes them, put them in hermetic bags and send them to other cities. He has been doing this for 14 years, from 4am to approximately 10pm every day of the year, and counts with the help of two family members. For the past 2 years he has also worked as a mototaxi driver in the evenings, but only when he is not too tired from his job as a fish salesman.

He really enjoys what he does because he feels he's helping to distribute the fish species that exist in the rivers of his city. He also enjoys promoting its preservation by rejecting and bringing to the authorities' attention situations where the fish is not suitable for consumption, either because of its size or because it's closed season. 

He looks forward to exporting his products in larger quantities in the future. This is his second loan with the institution MFP and is very satisfied to know he counts with a financial support to move forward in his job. He's also happy to be part of his communal bank, where all its members are very responsible and caring. The requested 700 nuevos soles will go towards obtaining the financial capital he needs to buy more fish to sell to other cities.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of fish.

loans.name: Rosaura

texts.es:
Rosaura, de 51 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser amable y cordial en su trato a los demás. Esta casada con Ronald, quien se dedica ala construcción de viviendas. Vive en su casa propia en compañía de su esposo y sus  04 hijos de 33, 30, 28  y 25 años.
La actividad que realiza Rosaura es la venta de comidas como menús, que prepara en su casa y entrega en la modalidad de pensión  diaria a 15  trabajadores de una constructora cercana a su vivienda. Para eso cuenta con los implementos en su casa donde prepara todos los alimentos y los entrega en tapers. Realizando el cobro semanal de los alimentos. 
Se inició hace más de 10 años, con un capital propio y preparando en pequeñas cantidades, viendo la acogida que tenía su negocio, decidió continuar, y hasta el momento cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos en la preparación y atención de los clientes, compartiendo sus ganancias con ellos.
Considera  su negocio bastante rentable porque casi siempre acaba todo lo que prepara para vender, dejándole buenas ganancias.
Decidió empezar con éste negocio debido a la necesidad de contar con un oficio y un ingreso económico para cubrir sus gastos y apoyara a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.
Viendo los buenos resultados que está tendiendo con su negocio tiene planes de continuar y hacerlo crecer. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 04 con la institución MFP, está contenta de saber que tendrá acceso a un apoyo financiero para concretar sus planes. También esta muy agradecida con la institución que le permite crecer como persona.  Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de utensilios para cocina como ollas, platos, vasos y otros, para renovar los que tiene, así brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes. También en víveres e ingredientes para la preparación de los menús.
texts.en:
Rosaura is 51 years old, and is a very earnest, kind and hardworking woman. She is married to Ronald, who works in the construction industry, and they live in their own home with their four children, ages 33, 30, 28 and 25. Rosaura makes a living cooking and selling food items, which she prepares in her home and delivers to 15 construction workers who are on site near her house. She collects payments weekly from her customers.

Rosaura started her business on a very small scale over 10 years ago with her own savings. Her family needed her to generate additional income to help with household expenses, so she decided to launch a business from home. As demand for her food dishes continued to grow, Rosaura decided to move forward with her business. Her children now help her with food preparation and delivery, and she splits her profits with them. With years of experience under her belt, Rosaura is able to accurately estimate the amount of food that her customers need each day, and she therefore wastes very little food and is able to increase her profit margin. 

As she continued to have success with her operation, Rosaura decided to expand her business. This will be her fourth loan with MFP, and she is grateful for the personal and financial support she has received from the institution. With the support from this loan, Rosaura plans to purchase kitchen utensils for her business, including bowls, plates, cups and other items to better serve her clients. She also plans to purchase food ingredients to use in preparing her food dishes.

loans.use: to purchase utensils, bowls, plates, cups, etc.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es casada, su esposo es instalador de gas y tienen dos hijos, viven en casa alquilada en un acabado fino con piso de machihembre ocupan tres habitaciones; la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Ciudad Satélite de la ciudad de El Alto.

El Nivel de educación de María es Licenciatura, actualmente es profesora, además con su esposo tienen una empresa de Instalación de gas, con lo cual cubren los gastos de alquiler, luz, agua, alcantarillado, y de alimentación.

El crédito lo requiere para la compra de herramientas para Instalación de Gas (llaves inglesas para entornillar los tubos, sopletes para soldar).

El sueño de María junto a su esposo es hacer crecer su empresa y así mejorar sus ingresos económicos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.

Es la cuarta vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
María is married.  Her husband is a gas installer, and they have two children.  They live in a rented house, occupying three rooms.  It has fine finishing touches and a wood floor.  The house is located in the Ciudad Satélite area of the city of El Alto.  María has a degree, and she is currently a teacher.  In addition, her husband has a gas installation business with which they cover the expenses for rent, electricity, water, sewers, and food.

She needs the loan to buy tools for gas installation (Crescent wrenches to use on the pipes and soldering torches).

María’s dream is, together with her husband, to make his business grow.  This way their income will improve so that they can have a better quality of life.

This is the fourth loan she has requested from IMPRO and the first one with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy tools for their home gas installation business.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Mario, está casado, y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar los insumos como abonos para asistir su plantación de maíz. El cuenta con varios años ya de trabajar en esto tipo de siembras por lo cual necesita comprar estos productos y mejoras su plantación. El espera con esta mejora poder generar el máximo de producción y así aumentar las ganancias para su bienestar y el de su familia. El tienen pensado salir adelante con los pagos de su crédito también con lo generado con su cosecha de maíz y lo mas importante mejorar su economía. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Mario is a married man and his wife is his first priority. He plans to use the requested loan to buy inputs, such as fertilizer, to assist his corn cultivated field. He has several years of experience in this type of crops and now needs to buy this products to improve his harvest. He expects that this improvement will maximize production and increase his income to support himself and his family. He plans to repay the loan with the corn yield, as well as to improve his financial situation. 

This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR. He hasn't received any loans from national banks in the past, but FUDECOSUR has offered him this loan with better conditions and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to assist his corn cultivated field.

loans.name: Jóvenes Del Cambio Group

texts.es:
Olga (a la mitad de la fotografía) una señorita de 24 años de edad soltera y vive en Sololá   junto a sus padres y sus hermanos.
Ella se dedica a la fabricación de prendas típicas femeninas que utilizan en su comunidad. Este trabajo lo aprendió de su madre desde niña ya que utilizaba la mitad del día para trabajar elaborando estas prendas y la otra mitad era para estudiar. 
Ahora gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres y el de ella pudo terminar una carrera académica en la escuela por lo tanto la falta de oportunidades de empleo es muy paca de este modo decide realizar este trabajo independientemente para poder aportar a la economía y el desarrollo de su familia. 
Tiene un  año de fabricar estas prendas viendo que sus ganancias son buenas,  ahora quiere  invertir más capital para fabricar mejores productos.
Ella es la  representante y la que tomo la iniciativa de formar este grupo de señoritas solicitando un préstamo para ampliar sus negocios ella quiere comprar hilos de diferentes colores y de diferente calidad.  
Las otras integrantes (las dos de cada lado de la fotografía) una de ellas también fabrica prendas típicas femeninas y la otra integrante tiene una crianza de pollos ellas también  utilizaran una parte de este crédito y ampliar sus negocios.
Ellas tienen una meta de seguir invirtiendo y tener un negocio más grande en un futuro teniendo mejores ingresos para sus familias.
texts.en:
Olga (standing in the middle in the photograph) is twenty-four years old.  She is single and lives in Sololá  together with her parents and siblings.  She makes a living in manufacturing typical feminine clothing that are worn in her community.  She learned this trade from her mother when she was a young girl.  She uses half the day to work and make the clothing and the other half of the day to study.

Thanks to her own effort and that of her parents, she was able to finish her studies in school.  However, the lack of employment opportunities is widepread.  Because of this, she decided to take up this work independently, in order to be able to contribute to the economy and development of her family.

She has been manufacturing clothing for one year, and sees that her profits are good.  Currently, she wants to invest more capital in order to make better products.

She is the representative that took the initiative to form this group of young women who are now requesting a loan to grow their businesses.  She wants to buy threads of different colors and different qualities.

The other members are the two women on either side of her in the photo.  One of them also manufactures women's clothing, and the other has a business raising chickens.  They also will use part of this loan for their own businesses.  

They have a goal of continuing to invest and to have larger businesses in the future with better incomes for their families.

loans.use: to buy materials for the manufacture of typical feminine clothing.

loans.name: Antenor

texts.es:
Antenor, de 46 años  es un hombre trabajador. Vive desde hace 15 años en una casa alquilada, junto a su esposa Carmen y 4 de sus 6 hijos. 
Desde hace 18 años, comenzó su travesía por la agricultura sus sembríos de papa en los terrenos que heredó de parte de su madre, le ayudaron a consolidar su experiencia en la agricultura, cuenta que pasó muchos problemas para tener lo que hoy posee, una estabilidad económica. Sus sembríos de papa, muchas veces se malograban y no resultaban, “existían cosechas en las que ganaba y otras en las que perdía lo invertido”, afirma. Es así que comenzó a sembrar quinua, cebada y demás hortalizas, de las que invertía poco y ganaba más. Sus cosechas son reconocidas en el valle, por lo que en cada siembra ya tienen compradores fijos que llegan a su pueblo a comercializarlas. Ahora desea mejorar la calidad de sus frutos para obtener más ganancias, espera ahorrar lo suficiente, ya que también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como ovejas cerdos y vacas, las cuales engorda para luego venderlas a un mayor precio. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “Cruz de espinas” y este es el crédito número 11 con MFP, en todo estos años de trabajo, obtuvo buenos resultados en su negocio y en su vida personal, por lo que se encuentra agradecido, por ello promete ser puntual con sus cuotas, además le agrada pertenecer a su asociación, pues se apoyan y son como una familia.
Antenor, invertirá el dinero en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus cultivos, pues ya están creciendo y necesitan nutrientes.
texts.en:
Antenor is a hard-working, 46-year-old man. He has lived in a rented house for the past 15 years.  He lives there with his wife Carmen and 4 of his 6 children.

18 years ago, he started his work in agriculture, sowing potatoes in the fields that he inherited from his mother.  They helped to strengthen his experience in agriculture. He says that he has overcome many problems to achieve the economic stability he has today. His potato fields often spoiled and did not turn out. “There were harvests where I made money and others where I lost my investment,” Antenor says. This is why he started to plant quinoa, barley and other vegetables, which required less investment and earned more money. Antenor's harvests are well-known in the valley.  Each time he sows his crops, he already has fixed buyers that come to his village for them. Now, Antenor hopes to improve the quality of his crops to earn more.  He hopes to save a sufficient amount, since he also raises young animals, like sheep, pigs and cows, that he wants to fatten and later sell for a higher price. 

Antenor belongs to the solidarity group, “Cruz de espinas,” and this is his 11th loan with MFP.  In all his years of work, he has had good results with his business and his personal life, which he is thankful for.  He promises to be punctual with his payments. He is also thankful he belongs to "Cruz de espinas," since the group members help each other and are like a family.

Antenor will use the money to buy organic manure to nourish his crops, since they are already growing and need nutrients.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Luca

texts.en:
Luca is a farmer in Kakamega County in western Kenya, where he lives with his eight children. 

This is Luca's first loan, and he is excited to be using it to buy Honey Care beehives. He says they are the best quality hives and produce the most honey. He plans to use the revenue from his new hives to pay for his children's school fees. 

In the future, Luca hopes to expand his farm, buy more land, and start dairy farming.

loans.use: to buy beehives to supplement his income.

loans.name: Lleni

texts.es:
Lleni, de 28 años, es una amable mujer joven, emprendedora y muy trabajadora, es madre de cuatro hijos de 7, 6, 3 y 1 año de edad, vive junto a ellas y a su conviviente desde hace 13 años llamado Adriano en su casa propia con quien comparte sus días trabajando mucho para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
El trabajo de Lleni consiste en la venta de abarrotes, su negocio está ubicado el interior de su propia casa desde hace 2 años aproximadamente, en una calle muy concurrida de la ciudad, ahí van todos los días sus clientes en busca de todo tipo de productos que ella tiene para ofrecer. Se inició en esta actividad hace 05 años. Antes lo realizaba en forma ambulatoria y eso le generaba cierta incomodidad, a la par que ofrecía a la venta pescados, sin embargo luego de mucho esfuerzo pudo establecer su propia tienda en su casa y está más tranquila por el momento, eventualmente alterna su trabajo ejerciendo el oficio de cocinera en alguna obra de trabajo al que es llamada para saciar el hambre de los obreros. Cuando estableció su negocio en su casa tuvo muchas dificultades como la competencia de otras bodegas que ya existían en su barrio, pero con el pasar del tiempo pudo superarlos, ahora su tienda es muy visitada pues ofrece artículos variados, precios cómodos, trato amable y sobre todo atiende desde muy temprano y esta siempre a la espera con una sonrisa para sus clientes.
Le gusta mucho lo que hace ya que le permite poder ver a sus niños en su casa, además le está yendo muy bien ya que genera muchos ingresos para su hogar, tiene muchos planes para su negocio como agrandarlo y así poder vender en mayor cantidad. Por tanto éste será su préstamo número 06 con la institución MFP, está muy contenta por el apoyo financiero que está recibiendo y por la confianza que depositan en ella para seguir adelante, agradece el asesoramiento que ha recibido y está muy segura de avanzar con el apoyo de su grupo comunal ya que considera que todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado 1200 soles, comprará 3 sacos de arroz, 2 sacos de azúcar, cajas de leche grande, leche chica, aceites en litros, fideos, productos enlatados, embutidos y otros artículos de consumo diario.
texts.en:
Lleni is twenty-eight years old and is a caring, enterprising, and hard-working young woman.  She is the mother of four children, ages seven, six, three, and one.  She lives with her children and partner of thirteen years; his name is Adriano.  They live in their own house and Adriano and Lleni spend their days working a lot in order to offer a better quality of life to their family.

Lleni's work involves a grocery store.  Her business has been located in her own home for approximately two years.  The house is on a very busy street in the city.  All of her customers go there every day in search of every type of typical product that Lleni has to offer.  She began this activity five years ago.  Before, she worked by selling door-to-door, but this was uncomfortable as she was also selling fish.  However, after a lot of effort she was able to establish her own store in her home.  For the moment, she is much more calm.  Possibly, she will alternate her work with being a cook, a job that will help to satisfy the hunger of the laborers.  

When she began her business in her home, she had a lot of challenges, like the competition with other grocery shops that already existed in her neighborhood.  But with the passage of time, she was able to overcome this.  Now, her store is visited often, since she offers various products at comfortable prices.  She also treats her customers with kindness and above all, she opens her store very early and is always waiting with a smile for her customers.  

She likes what she does very much, since it allows her to be able to see her children in her house.  Her business is also going very well and is already generating a lot of income for her home.  She has many plans for her business, like expanding it and thereby being able to sell in larger quantities.  

This will be her sixth loan with the institution.  She is very happy for the financial support that she is receiving and for the confidence that the institution places in her to continue moving forward.  She is thankful for the advice she has received and is sure she will advance with the support of her communal group.  She thinks that all the members are responsible and caring people.

With the amount requested (1200 soles), she will buy three sacks of rice, two sacks of sugar, large boxes of milk, small cartons of milk, liters of oil, noodles, canned products, sausages, and other items consumed on a daily basis.

loans.use: to buy three sacks of rice, two sacks of sugar, large boxes of milk, small cartons of milk, liters of oil, noodles, canned products, sausages, and other items consumed on a daily basis.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
Juan tiene 39 años de edad es  casado  tiene un hijo vive con  en el Recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos. 

Pertenece a la Ventanilla LOS AMIGOS se encuentra ubicada el  recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO  , perteneciente al cantón Ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias. 

Juan se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz y la crianza de animales de corral como pollos y patos. Con el crédito podrá comprar insumos como: fertilizantes, abonos, insecticidas para evitar las plagas y enfermedades, ademas alieto para los animales balanceado. Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de Ventanas. 

El sueño es comprar un terreno, en los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte
texts.en:
Juan is 39 years old and is married with one son. He lives with him in the precinct of Zapotal Nuevo, belonging to the Canton of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

He belongs to the communal bank Los Amigos, located in the precinct of Zapotal Nuevo, belonging to the Canton of Ventanas. He works in agriculture and livestock. 

Juan works in agriculture sowing corn and raising farm animals like chickens and ducks. With the loan, he will be able to buy supplies such as: fertilizer, compost, and insecticides to avoid plagues and diseases, in addition to balanced feed for the animals. He will make his purchases in the city of Ventanas. 

His dream is to buy a plot of land; in his free time, he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, compost, and insecticides to avoid plagues and diseases, in addition to balanced feed for his animals.

loans.name: Moris

texts.en:
Moris is a farmer in Kakamega County, where he lives with his seven children. 

Moris will use this loan to buy more beehives, as he believes in the nutritional value of honey and thinks that beekeeping is a good way to earn income without too much strain. He plans to use the revenue from his hives to pay his children's school fees and to venture into poultry farming. 

In the future, Moris hopes to expand his beekeeping and poultry businesses and improve his overall living standard.

loans.use: to buy beehives to supplement his income.

loans.name: Giovana

texts.es:
La señora Giovanna es casada tiene dos hijos, su esposo es chofer, viven en casa de sus padres ocupando dos habitaciones en un acabado de ladrillo y piso de machihembre, la casa esta ubicada en la zona de Bajo San Antonio de la ciudad de La Paz.

Giovanna es comerciante, tiene una tienda de Frial vende carnes frías y  empaque de frutas, legumbres y hortalizas frescas, ella junto a su esposo trabajan por mas de ocho horas al día para mantener a su familia, cubrir los gastos de servicios básicos, de alimentación y otros.

El crédito lo requiere para aumento de su capital, es decir comprar más embutidos para su Frial y así ofrecer variedad y mejorar sus ingresos.

El sueño de Giovanna es hacer crecer su negocio para mejorar sus ingresos económicos y así mejorar  calidad de vida de su familia.

La cliente se encuentra muy contenta con el crédito otorgado ya que es la segunda vez que trabaja con IMPRO y la primera con KIVA.
texts.en:
Giovanna is married and has two children.  Her husband is a driver.  They live in her parents’ house, occupying two rooms with brick finish and a wood floor.  The house is located in the Bajo San Antonio area of the city of La Paz.

Giovanna is a merchant.  She has a fresh meat store where she sells cold meats, packaged fruits and grains, and fresh vegetables.  She works together with her husband for over eight hours a day in order to support their family and cover the expenses for basic services, food, and other expenses.

She needs the loan to increase her capital.  That is to say she needs the loan to get more sausages for her store.  This way she will offer variety and improve her income.

Giovanna’s dream is to make her business grow in order to improve her income.  That way she will improve her family’s quality of life.

She is very happy with the loan she was given.  This is the second time she has worked with IMPRO and the first with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy sausages for her store in order to offer her customers more variety.

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es:
Teofilo tiene 62 años de edad es  casado tiene un hijo vive con la esposa y con los hijos en el Recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos. 

Pertenece a la Ventanilla LOS AMIGOS se encuentra ubicada el  recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO  , perteneciente al cantón Ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias. 

Teofilo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz y la crianza de animales de corral como pollos y patos. Con el crédito podrá comprar insumos como: fertilizantes, abonos, insecticidas para evitar las plagas y enfermedades, ademas alieto para los animales balanceado. Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de Ventanas. 

El sueño es comprar un terreno , en los tiempos libres le gusta tocar la guitarra,
texts.en:
Teofilo is 62 years old and married with one son. He lives with his wife and the children in the community of Zapotal Nuevo, which belongs to the canton of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

He belongs to the Los Amigos communal bank, also located in Zapotal Nuevo, which is dedicated to agriculture and livestock.

Teofilo makes a living sowing corn and raising farm animals, such as chickens and ducks. With this loan, he will be able to buy supplies such as fertilizers, manure, and insecticides to avoid infestation and disease, as well as balanced feed for the animals. He buys his supplies in the city of Ventanas.

His dream is to buy a plot of land. In his free time, he likes to play the guitar.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, and insecticides to avoid infestation and disease, as well as balanced feed for animals.

loans.name: Geoffrey

texts.en:
Geoffrey has three children and lives in Kakamega County in western Kenya. 

This is Geoffrey’s first loan, and he will use it to buy more beehives to place on his farmland. He likes the simplicity of beekeeping and the fact that beekeeping requires little labour, which frees him up for other tasks. 

With the revenue from his new hives, Geoffrey hopes to buy two dairy cows and engage in both beekeeping and dairy farming. He also plans to use the income from the beehives to help pay for his children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy beehives to supplement his income.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is from Kakamega County in western Kenya, where she lives with nine children. 

This is Joyce’s first loan, and she will use the revenues from her beehives to help take care of the local orphans who live with her. She enjoys beekeeping and likes the medicinal properties of honey. 

In the future, Joyce hopes to expand her farmlands and become "a big farmer."

loans.use: to buy beehives to supplement her income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beehives to supplement her income.

loans.name: Lorenzo Urbano

texts.es:
Lorenzo Urbano tiene 54 años de edad de estado civil casado tiene un hijo,vive con la esposa  y el hijo en Ventanas provincia de los rìos.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Lorenzo Urbano  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz.  Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en la mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de insumos, urea, fertilizantes, líquidos para la maleza para la siembra del maíz y arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para comprar los insumos y aumentar los ingresos para el bienestar de la familia. El sueño es poder comprar terrenos y un carro. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas en los sembrios. En los tiempos libres le gusta leer la Biblia y descansar.
texts.en:
Lorenzo Urbano is 54 years old and married with one son. He lives with his wife and son in the Ventanas province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank “La Verdad Nos Hará Libres” (The Truth Will Set Us Free) is located in the precinct of Caimito 1, belonging to the Canton of Ventanas. This communal bank is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural work sowing corn and rice.

Lorenzo Urbano works in agriculture, growing corn and rice. He buys his products in Ventanas and sells them in the same place.

The requested loan is for the purchase of supplies, such as urea, fertilizer, and liquid for weeds for growing corn and rice. The loan has helped him to buy supplies and increase his earnings for the well-being of his family. 

His dream is to be able to buy land and a car. The obstacles that he confronts are pests in the fields. In his free time, he likes to read the Bible and rest.

loans.use: to purchase supplies like urea, fertilizer, and liquid for weeds for sowing corn and rice.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther lives in Kakamega County in western Kenya with her four children. 

This is Esther’s first loan, and she is using the funds to purchase more beehives to place on her farmland. She plans to use the money generated by her beehives to help pay for her children's education. 

In the long term, Esther hopes to buy more land and perhaps even a car.

loans.use: to buy beehives to supplement her income.

loans.name: Alphonce

texts.en:
Alphonce lives with his seven children in Kakamega County in Western Kenya. 

He hopes one day to expand his farm and become a businessman. This is Alphonce’s first loan, and he plans to use the revenue from his new hives to buy rental houses that he can lease.

loans.use: to buy beehives to supplement his income.

loans.name: Caleb

texts.en:
Caleb is a farmer who lives in western Kenya. He has five children and several grandchildren. 

This is Caleb’s first loan, and he will use it to buy more beehives to place on his farmland. He believes that beekeeping is a good business because if you provide the bees with shelter, protection, and forage, your hives will be successful. Caleb plans to use the revenue generated by his beehives to pay for school fees, clothing, and food for his grandchildren. 

In the future, Caleb hopes to reorganize his home and fence his compound. He also hopes to expand his farm by keeping cattle and poultry.

loans.use: to buy beehives to supplement his income.

loans.name: Petita Angelica

texts.es:
Petita Angelica tiene 30 años  de estado civil actual union libre tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos y el conyugue en Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La ventanilla  LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Petita Angelica se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en la misma ciudad.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, insumos, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos  para la siembra del maíz y arroz. El préstamo le ayudado para comprar los abonos para las siembras y aumentar los ingresos para el bienestar de la familia. El sueño es comprar tierra y una casa. En los tiempos libres le gusta escuchar música.
texts.en:
Petita Angelica is 30 years old and is in a common-law marriage. She has two children. She lives with her children and partner in Ventanas, in the province of Los Ríos.

The La Verdad Nos Hará Libres ("Truth Will Make Us Free") Communal Bank is located in the community of Caimito 1, which belongs to the canton of Ventanas. This communal bank is dedicated to agricultural crops on the short growth cycle, such as corn and rice.

Petita Angelica makes a living sowing corn and rice. She buys her products in Ventanas and sells them in the same city.

She has applied for this loan to buy seeds, supplies, fertilizers, urea, and liquids to sow corn and rice. The loan will help her to buy manure for the sowing process and to increase her profits for the well-being of her family. 

Her dream is to buy land and a house. In her free time, she likes to listen to music.

loans.use: to buy seeds, supplies, fertilizers, urea, and liquids to sow corn and rice.

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es: El Sr.Sergio  tiene  33 años de edad, esta casado con Alicia  y tienen 2 hijos. el trabaja en  Transportes de Personal  desempeña el puesto de operador  desde hace 9 años, gracias a su trabajo ha podido solventar las necesidades en su hogar hasta el dia de hoy. en esta ocación esta solicitando el crédito para comprar pintura para pintar el exterior de su casa y cambiar  la puerta  ya que  esta m uy  deteriorada, agradecerá mucho el apoyo que se le brinda y usara el préstamo para comprar pintua y una puerta para su vivienda.
texts.en: Sergio is 33 years old. He is married to Alicia and they have 2 children. He works in the personnel transport sector where he has been a driver for the past 9 years. His work has enabled him to meet all the household needs until now. The loan he is requesting on this occasion is to buy paint in order to paint the exterior of his house and to change the door as it is in very bad condition. He will be very grateful for the support received and will use the loan to buy paint and a door for his home.

loans.use: to paint his house

loans.name: Carlos Tomas

texts.es:
Carlos Tomas tiene 20 años de edad de estado civil union libre y vive con la conyugue y el hijo. Vive en el Recinto Caimito  en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz, legumbre.

Carlos Tomas se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en la mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, insumos, fertilizantes, urea, abonos para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para cumplir con la meta de sembrar y comprar los productos agrícolas para las siembras. El sueño es poder comprarse mas terrenos para sembrar y mejorar los ingresos en la venta de la cosecha.

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte y escuchar música.
texts.en:
Carlos Tomas, age 20, is in a common-law marriage.  He lives with his wife and their son in the Caimito precinct in the Ventanas canton.

The ‘La Verdad Nos Hará Libres’ [The Truth Will Make Us Free] communal bank is located in the Caimito 1 precinct of Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice, and vegetables.

Carlos Tomas grows corn and rice. He buys his products in Ventanas and sells them at the same place.

The requested loan is for buying seeds, supplies, fertilizers, urea, and manure for growing corn. The loan will help him to achieve his planting goal, and it will help him buy agricultural products for sowing.

His dream is to be able to buy more land to sow and to improve the income from the sale of his harvest.  

In his free time Carlos Tomas likes to play sports and listen to music.

loans.use: to buy seeds, supplies, fertilizers, urea, and manure for growing corn.

loans.name: Vicente Javier

texts.es:
Vicente  tiene 43 años de edad es  casado tiene dos hijos vive solo en el Recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos. 

Pertenece a la Ventanilla LOS AMIGOS se encuentra ubicada el  recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO  , perteneciente al cantón Ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias. 

Vicente se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz y la crianza de animales de corral como pollos y patos. Con el crédito podrá comprar insumos como: fertilizantes, abonos, insecticidas para evitar las plagas y enfermedades, ademas alieto para los animales balanceado. Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de Ventanas. 

El sueño es comprar un terreno, en los tiempos libres le gusta salir hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Vicente is 43 years old. He is married and has two children. He lives alone in the Zapotal Nuevo district, which belongs to the Ventanas canton in the province of Los Rios. He belongs to the rural communal bank "Los Amigos," which is located in the Zapotal Nuevo district in the Ventanas province and is dedicated to farming and livestock-raising businesses.

Vicente works in agriculture, planting corn and raising barnyard animals such as chickens and ducks. With the loan he will be able to buy supplies such as fertilizers, compost, and insecticides to avoid pests and diseases, in addition to balanced animal feed. He makes his purchases in the city of Ventanas.

His dream is to buy some land. In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, compost, and insecticides to avoid pests and diseases, as well as balanced feed for his animals

loans.name: Santos Felix

texts.es: Santos Félix de cincuenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas además todo lo vende le da la oportunidad de alcanzar el máximo de ganancias, es muy conocido en toda la zona ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren por la calidad, el buen servicio pero sobre todo por los precios accesibles; Santos es un hombre activo, trabajador y muy luchador desea alcanzar cada uno de sus sueños y el principal es darle a su familia una vida plena pues son lo mas importante que posee, desde hace algún tiempo su vivienda tiene algunos desperfectos y para seguridad y comodidad de los miembros del hogar desea repararlos pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tejas, sementó polines para el techo etc. Santos Félix tiene buenas referencias de pago y tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido, además se siente muy satisfecho con la ayuda pues sabe que podrá aprovecharla al máximo.
texts.en:
Fifty one-year old Santos Félix lives with his life partner and his children.  He makes his living in agriculture, specifically, planting corn and beans.  He has been in this line of work for many years and has gained valuable experience that allows him to get the best harvests.  Moreover, he sells everything, which allows him to maximize his profits.  

He is well known in the entire region and has many customers, since people prefer him for the quality, good service, and above all, the accessible prices. 

Santos is an active, hardworking and determined man.  He wants to achieve every one of his dreams, and the main one is to give his family a full life, since they are the most important thing he has.  For some time, his housing has had some flaws, and for the security and comfort of the members of his household, he would like to repair them.  However, he does not have sufficient capital.  This is why he is applying for a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy tiles, cement, poles for the roof, etc.  

Santos Félix has good payment references and is certain he will be able to repay the debt in the established timeframe.  Moreover, he feels very satisfied with the assistance and knows that he will be able to make the most of it.

loans.use: tiles, cement, poles for the roof, and flooring.

loans.name: Suresh

texts.en:
Suresh is a 41-year-old differently able person living with his wife and three daughters who are 15, 13 and 11 years old in a village of Odisha, India. He runs a general store in his village where he sells lentils, spices, salt, biscuits, tea, vegetable etc. He has very good relations with his customers.  He earns 3,000 INR from this store, which is very little for a family of five members to survive.

He has a plan to add more stocks like wheat flour to his shop and a few more products like hair oil, shampoo, potatoes, onions, etc  Suresh has requested a loan of 20,000 INR to purchase more stock of what he sells and some new products that are mentioned above. He says that doing so will attract more customers as he will be able to fulfill the maximum demands of his customers and increase his client base. He has a dream of having his children well educated and saving some money for his daughters' marriage.

loans.use: To purchase more stocks like  lentils, rice, biscuits, wheat, flour, hair oil, shampoo, potatoes, onions, etc.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: Armando vive junto y su compañera de vida y su hijo, él se dedica al cultivo de jícama, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener siempre la mejores cosechas, el terreno esta en un lugar accesible apto para el cultivo y con suelo fértil, todo lo que produce lo comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además se caracteriza por tener el mejor servicio; Armando es un hombre decidido, responsable y muy trabajador, tiene muchas metas para el futuro y con empeño y constancia piensa alcanzarlas, en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo algunas perdidas y quiere recuperarse pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le s solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de jícama, herbicida, abono, herramienta, etc. Armando tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable, se siente contenta con la ayuda y asegura poder saldar la deuda, a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Armando lives with his life partner and son.  He sells hibiscus, has been doing this for several years, and has lots of valuable experience that allows him to have better crops.  The land is very accessible, has fertile soil, and is ideal for farming.  He sells his harvest around the community and he has many customers who know that everything he sells is of top quality and at good prices.  He also provides excellent service.

Armando is a very dedicated and responsible hardworking man with many goals for the future that he plans to achieve.  In the last planting season he had some losses and he wants to recover but he doesn’t have enough capital.  He is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL which will allow him to buy hibiscus seed, herbicide, compost, tools, etc.  Armando has good payment references and impeccable morality. He is happy for the help and promises to repay the debt and provides his family with a good life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Elin Daniel

texts.es: Elin, tiene 35 años de edad, casado, tiene 3 hijos, vive con su esposa e hijos en el municipio de Trinidad Santa Bárbara. Lenin tiene 13 años de dedicarse a la elaboración de calzado. El elabora tenis, zapato de vestir como chinela y zapato de trabajo tipo burro. Este zapato es vendido en la comunidad y sus alrededores. Su negocio se ha mantenido mediante varios préstamos que ha obtenido con ODEF. Actualmente solicita el tercer préstamo que es por 15,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar cuero, suela, pegamento, esponja, manta, hilo, ojetes gamuza y pemil para la fabricación de más zapatos. Con esta inversión el espera incrementar su inventario y aumentar las ventas aprovechando esta temporada. Su meta es hacer crecer el negocio y tener otro taller mas, en lo personal quiere estar siempre con su núcleo familiar y retomar el ministerio pastoral.
texts.en:
Elin, age 35, is married and has three children.  He lives with his wife and children in the Trinidad municipality in Santa Bárbara.  Elin has been making shoes for 13 years.  He makes various types of shoes like tennis shoes, dress shoes, and boot-like work shoes.  These shoes are sold in the community and surrounding areas.  He has maintained his business through various loans he has obtained with ODEF.

He is currently requesting his third loan for 15,000 lempiras.  He will use the loan to buy leather, soles, glue, eyelets, and other supplies to make more shoes.  With this investment he hopes to increase his inventory and his sales by taking advantage of this season.

His goal is to grow in the business and to have other shops.  Personally, he wants to always be with his nuclear family and to resume his pastoral ministry.

loans.use: to buy leather, soles, glue, eyelets, and other supplies to make more shoes.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan  es un hombre agricultor de 53  años de edad.  El está en unión simple con su esposa  y  vive en Sololá.  El tiene siete hijos,  cinco mujeres de ellas cuatro están casadas y una soltera quien estudia en la escuela de la comunidad el nivel básico. Dos hijos varones que están casados y trabajan independientemente.

El se dedica a la agricultura cultivando cebolla y papa  en parcelas que tiene  a pocos metros de su casa, esto lo aprendió de su padre desde niño porque el lo ayudaba en el campo de la agricultura siendo su principal trabajo en la actualidad.
El empezó a trabajar su propio cultivo desde hace 25 años, vio las posibilidades de ser independiente y obtener su propia ganancia cultivando estas verduras.   De este modo el solicita un préstamo de   Q  3,000.00 para que el pueda comprar semillas de zanahoria y fertilizante para cultivar  y cosecharlo mejorando sus ingresos junto a su familia. 
El sueña con expandir su cultivo en otras parcelas para generar mejores ganancias para su familia.
texts.en:
Juan, 53, is a farmer.  He lives with his wife in Sololá.  He has seven children.  Of his five daughters, four are married and the single one is at the basic education level in a school in the community.  His two male children are married and work on their own.

He makes a living in agriculture growing onions and potatoes on his plots of land a few meters from his house.  He learned this from his father when he was a little boy because he used to help him in the fields.  Currently this is his main job.  He began to work his own crop 25 years ago.  He saw the possibilities of being independent and earning his own profits by growing these vegetables.

He's requesting a loan for 3,000 Q [GTQ, quetzales] to buy carrot seeds and fertilizer to better grow and harvest, improving his and his family's income.

He dreams of expanding his crops onto other plots of land to generate better profits for his family.

loans.use: to buy carrot seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Pabitra

texts.en:
Pabitra is a 23-year-old differently able person living with his parents and brother in Odisha, India. He owns a variety and betel store in his village. He sells betel, biscuits, wafers, hair oil, talcum powder, soaps, chocolates and other daily household consumables.

His family lives on 5,000 INR per month currently and he wants to earn more for the betterment of his family. He has requested a loan of 30,000 INR to buy more variety of the stock he is selling right now and offer a better quality and range of products to his customers. He hopes to save some money for him and his family's future.

loans.use: to purchase betel, biscuits, hair oil, talcum powder, soaps, chocolates, etc. for his variety shop

loans.name: Ananta

texts.en:
Ananta is a 36-year-old physically challenged person. He lives with his parents, sister, wife and children. He has a small grocery store in his village. He is selling food items like vegetables, rice, lentils, salt, detergents, soap, spices, etc. He has to travel every three days to the nearest market in Balugaon to get more stock. He wants to reinvest in his grocery store so that he can stock up more inventory at his shop to meet the demands of the local people and reduce his transportation and buying costs. This will increase his earning capacity.

Ananta has requested a loan of 20,000 INR to purchase more of the items he stocks, add more variety to his product line and more stock for his grocery shop and grow his business.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, rice, lentils, salt, detergents, soap, spices, etc. for his grocery shop.

loans.name: Martha Maria

texts.es: Martha María de 26 años de edad, comerciante casada con dos hijos ambos menores de edad 2 y 7 añitos, el mayor estudia en primaria, su negocio consiste en una pulpería con cinco años de tenerla, ella está muy agradecida por haberles brindado apoyo en su negocio que con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha salido adelante con sus dos hijos que todavía está a su cargo,  ella está solicitando financiamiento incrementar más su negocio en las compras de productos como: Arroz, Azúcar, Frijoles Maíz, Jabón, Avena, Aceite, Trigo, Verduras y otros productos que son demandados por sus clientes y así el poder brindarles a ellos una gran variedad de productos.-
texts.en:
Martha María is 26 years old. She works as a merchant and is married with two young children, ages 2 and 7. The older child is in primary school.

She has had a small grocery store for five years. She is very grateful for the support for her business. With plenty of effort and dedication, she has been able to provide for her two children, who are still in her care.

She is applying for financing to grow her business by buying products such as rice, sugar, beans, corn, soap, oats, oil, wheat, vegetables, and other products which her clients request. She will then be able to offer them a wide variety of products.

loans.use: to stock her business and to put a floor down on the porch where she built her business.

loans.name: Jose Isidro

texts.es: José Isidro de veintisiete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol,  ya tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite siempre obtener las mejores cosechas para el comercio, el terreno de siembra es de alta incidencia agrícola, es alquilado y está cercano a su vivienda; vende por todos los alrededores del lugar y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren por el excelente servicio, la calidad del producto;  José es un hombre visionario y muy entregado a su trabajo quiere ganar un futuro próspero y sabe que con su constancia y motivación logrará ese éxito; en la  cosecha pasada tuvo grandes pérdidas por motivos del cambio de clima y en este periodo de siembra quiere recuperarse pero necesita de un respaldo de capital con el que pueda invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herbicida, herramienta etc. José Isidro tiene buen record de crédito y es muy responsable con sus pagos mantiene su palabra de que podrá cancelar la deuda en el tiempo establecido y a la vez tiene esperanza de llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
José Isidro is 27 years old and lives with her life partner. He makes a living cultivating corn and beans and has several years of experience in agriculture, which allows him to always obtain the best harvests for trade. The cultivated field is of high agricultural impact, rented and close to his home. He sells in all the vicinities and has many clients, given that people chooses him for the excellent service and the quality of his product. 

José is a visionary man and very devoted to his job. He looks forward to a prosperous future and knows that he will reach this goal with determination and motivation. He had big losses in the past harvest as a result of climate change and wants to recover in this harvest period. In order to obtain the financial support he needs to invest in inputs, he is requesting a loan to INTEGRAL. He will use he loan to buy corn seed, beans, fertilizer, weed-killer, tools, etc. José Isidro has a good repayment credit and is very responsible with regards to his payments. He promises he will be able to repay the loan as scheduled and expects to bring financial security to his home.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, beans, fertilizer, weed-killer and tools.

loans.name: Geovanny Florentino

texts.es:
Geovanny tiene 27 años de edad es  soltero  tiene un hijo vive solo en el Recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos. 

Pertenece a la Ventanilla LOS AMIGOS se encuentra ubicada el  recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO  , perteneciente al cantón Ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias. 

Geovanny se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz y la crianza de animales de corral como pollos y patos. Con el crédito podrá comprar insumos como: fertilizantes, abonos, insecticidas para evitar las plagas y enfermedades, ademas alieto para los animales balanceado. Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de Ventanas. 

El sueño es comprar un terreno para seguir sembrando, en los tiempos libres le gusta salir jugar indor.
texts.en:
Geovanny is 27 years old and single with one son. He lives by himself in the community of Zapotal Nuevo, which belongs to the canton of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

He belongs to the Los Amigos Communal Bank, also located in Zapotal Nuevo, which is dedicated to agriculture and livestock.

Geovanny makes a living in agriculture by sowing corn. He also raises farm animals such as chickens and ducks. With this loan, he will be able to buy supplies such as fertilizers, manure, and insecticides to avoid infestation and disease, as well as balanced feed for the animals. He makes his purchases in the city of Ventanas.

His dream is to buy a plot of land to continue sowing crops. In his free time, he likes to go out and play indoor soccer.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, and insecticides to avoid infestation and disease, as well as balanced feed for animals.

loans.name: Alfredo Alejandro

texts.es:
Alfredo Alejandro tiene 19 años es soltero vive con sus padres en Ventanas Provincia de los rìos, no tiene hijos.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz. 

Alfredo Alejandro  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz.  Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en mismo lugar.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, urea, insumos, fertilizantes. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para poder sembrar. El sueño es tener una casa y un carro. En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte y leer la biblia.
texts.en:
Alfredo Alejandro is 19 years old. He is single and lives with his parents in Ventanas, in the province of Los Rios. He has no children.

The communal bank "La Verdad Nos Hara Libres" (The Truth Will Make Us Free) is located in the Caimito 1 district, which is part of the Ventanas canton. This rural credit service point works with short cycle agricultural businesses, such as planting corn and rice.

Alfredo Alejandro works in agriculture, planting corn and rice. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his products in the same place.

He is applying for the loan to purchase seeds, urea, supplies, and fertilizers. With the help of the loan, he will be able to buy what he needs to be able to plant. His dream is to have a house and a car. In his free time he likes to play sports and read the Bible.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, supplies, and fertilizers.

loans.name: Evarista

texts.es:
Evarista tiene 47 años, actualmente viuda, pero con dos grandes motivaciones que son sus hijos Michael y Edwin, uno de los cuales aun pequeño requiere todo el apoyo que solo su abnegada labor le podría brindar. Es propietaria de una vivienda a base de material noble. 
Desde tiempos de antaño ella y su esposo, han logrado establecer en un negocio dedicado a la venta de prendas de vestir así como la de zapatillas para las personas que laboran en el campo.
Considera su actividad muy rentable puesto que los productos que expende son netamente para la gente cuya labor principal son las actividades agrícolas, adicional a ello complementa su trabajo con el servicio de sastrería que inició hace poco por ser una actividad muy entretenida mientras no hay presencia de clientes en su negocio.
 Para iniciar el año con buena vibra  y un negocio bien surtido como es de su agrado desea contar con capital de trabajo para adquirir zapatillas y prendas de vestir que poseen mayor demanda en su negocio.
Tiene planeado a futuro cambiar de lugar y hacer una nueva vida en una ciudad más grande afrontando así un nuevo reto conjuntamente con su negocio. Con los 3,000 nuevos  soles surtirá su negocio con la compra de prendas de vestir consistente en zapatillas para el campo y demás prendas como pantalones, polos entre otros.
texts.en:
Evarista is 47 years old and now a widow. Her two greatest motivations are her sons, Michael and Edwin, one of whom, although small, requires all the help that her hard work can provide for him. She owns a house made of quality materials. 

Long ago, Evarista and her husband started a business to sell clothing, such as shoes for people who work on farms.

Evarista considers her activity very profitable since the products that she sells are purely for people who work in agriculture.  She also complements this work with the tailor service that she recently started as a way to entertain herself when there were no clients in her store.

To start the year with good vibes and a well stocked business, Evarista needs money to buy shoes and articles of clothing that are in high demand at her store.

In the future, Evarista plans to move and make a new life in a bigger city, facing a new challenge with her business. With the 3,000 Peruvian Nueves Soles, she will stock her business with articles of clothing such as shoes for farming.  She will also buy other articles of clothing, like pants and polo shirts among others.

loans.use: to buy articles of clothing and shoes

loans.name: Fortaleciendonos Juntos Con Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal se llama “Fortaleciéndonos juntos con Esperanza” está conformado por 17 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; venta de ropa, venta de cosméticos, venta de joyas de plata, venta de café, manteles, servicios entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Lota.
Yoni, integrante del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra sentado en primera fila, ocupando el segundo lugar de derecha a izquierda, viste camisa de color celeste, su cabello lo usa corto de color gris.
EL se dedica al rubro de arreglos varios, desde hace 10 años. Comenta que trabaja en su casa y otras veces a domicilio de su clientela, ofrece arreglos de lavadoras, cocinas, realiza cercos de ante jardín en las casas, lo que su clientela le pide el lo realiza.
La mercadería e insumos que va necesitando  como repuestos los compra en diferentes ferreterías y otras veces les dice a su clientela que las compré y el realiza el cobro del trabajo.
Con el crédito comprará solamente herramientas.
Una de las metas de Yoni es continuar con su rubro, poder ayudar a su clientela cuando le ocurra algún imperfecto y el pueda acudir y solucionar el problema, así también generar mayores ingresos para darles un buen pasar a su familia.
Yoni vive junto a su familia que se compone de su esposa y dos hijos de 11 y 15 años de edad. Sus sueños a nivel laboral crecer dia a dia en su rubro, y a nivel familiar darles un buen pasar a su familia para que no le falte nada.
El está muy contento y agradecido de la ayuda brindada por Fondo Esperanza para invertir en su negocio. Respecto al grupo del Banco Comunal del cual forma parte, comenta que en éste existe muy buena comunicación.
